thread.title: Heather Goddard
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Heather Goddard

author: Heather Goddard
title: Heather Goddard
text: I found Disc Makers available, helpful, and supportive throughout the process of recording and releasing my first album. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because there was a lack of understanding and information provided in the decision on choosing between slim line jewel cases and the traditional jewel cases. If I had known everything before that I know now about those 2 options, I would have chosen differently. Seems like they should have had more understanding to give me more information in that decision. Otherwise, I was very pleased.
